name: Black & Balls: Improved Edition
description:
Originally made for Improve My Game Jam 25

This game was truly originally made for Low Effort Jam 2, and now it was re-created for the Improve My Game Jam 25 beacus it was the perfect game to be recreated due to my general skill in game dev have significantly improved since I created the first version

Click the balls in order to progress. This time there are no pranks

Controls: Functions           Key 1 Key2 Key3 Gameplay Click MB left [W] [E]
